Name: IDEAS1_hopi_minesweeper
Title: HOUHPI Minesweeper Game
Subtitle: Indicator 1: HOUHPI Game mode
ShortDescription: This interactive game lets you explore urban health risks from air pollution and extreme heat in a playful way. Using the Health-Oriented Urban Heat and Pollution Index (HOUHPI), the minesweeper-style game challenges you to identify high-risk areas while learning how heat, pollution, population vulnerability, and access to healthcare combine to affect health in cities. The game is based on real Earth-observation data and changes daily, encouraging users to come back and discover how risks vary across urban areas.
